name: tm56
effect: Teaches Fling to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Fling to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move’s power and effects depend on the item.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move’s power and effects depend on the item.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.
